title: Devourer on vi
body: It basically replaces bortk but to a better degree as a dps offensive item for her, building full tank with devourer actually deals massive damage that you don't normally find in a vi build. Also I got the ice mallet for slow and lels{{item:3022}}

replies.body:
there are really only 2 VI(able - hue) builds
{{item:3725}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3110}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3102}} {{item:3111}} 

or

{{item:3723}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3102}} {{item:3111}} (replace {{item:3723}} with {{item:3153}} lategame)

building any attack speed outside of {{item:3153}} or {{item:3078}} is really wasting her potential as vi already has 2 auto-attack resets

get the {{item:3931}}   and the {{item:3153}} and{{item:3072}} and you can solo the baron with yi and insta kill anyone cos you will do 1k true damage in 3 sec then get a {{item:3031}} and {{item:1309}} and your last item get a {{item:3046}} for crit  and attack speed or {{item:3022}} for hp and slow

No, her ad scalings on all her abilities are high, and she is not a farm champion, she is a ganking champion, which means that getting stacks on it is unreliable. If you want to build dps tank, go Warrior enchantment, black cleaver and then defensive.
